title: Short-term intensive course on metacognitive strategies for internet-based science concept learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Personalized learning support utilizing metacognitive strategies to help learners systematically acquire complex scientific concepts in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously analyze advanced scientific concepts in internet-based environments by utilizing metacognitive strategies.
Learners can monitor their learning processes and adjust strategies through formative assessments.
Learners can explain real-world applications of scientific concepts using digital materials optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
